name: Panel Systems
tagline: It's an intelligent way of doing IT engineering.
description:
Panel is a Spanish IT Services company that has a clear vocation for innovation and a firm commitment to technological excellence and quality in all its activities.
We are specialized in developing and building Software, Quality Software and Test Services and Outsourcing services. We have always grown at a faster rate than the sector average, and we are among the top 50 companies in the Spanish ICT sector.
